website_summaries.verdict: Stands out from the rest by offering quality features and material that's made to last.
cons: Pricey, but you're paying for quality construction and durability

website_summaries.verdict: A quality six-piece set that will make packing much easier. The material is both stretchy and durable, so feel free to pack these cubes to capacity.
pros: The bags are all incredibly light, so you don't have to worry about going over an airline's weight limit
cons: Bags are well-sized for carry-on suitcases but might be tool small for anything bigger

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and functional!
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I have a standard size carryon and the X large, 3 long ones and the small bag fit perfectly in my carryon. Not the best of materials, but good sturdiness and stretch of the material. I fit a crazy amount of stuff in the 5 eBags I used: 3 pants, 2 dresses, 1 shorts, 6 shirts—a mix of long and short sleeves, pj top and bottom, 2 tank tops, 6 pairs of socks, 12 pairs of underwear, running tights, athletic shirt, sneakers, sandals, bathing suit and coverup.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Lee

customer_reviews.title: The cubes are great - my recommendation would be not to get the ...
customer_reviews.text: The cubes are great - my recommendation would be not to get the Value Set, the three pc set is great, the three smaller cubes are not as useful, if I could do it over again, I would get two of the three pc sets instead of the Value Set.
customer_reviews.author: gregory

customer_reviews.title: I enjoyed having the variety of sizes and used some in ...
customer_reviews.text: This entire set is a little too much to fit in a single carry on when full, but still worth buying. I enjoyed having the variety of sizes and used some in a checked bag and one in my backpack. I found it improved my ability to organize my suitcase and fit more in tremendously. These aren't "compression" style bags like one of the Eagle Creek line, but you can get a bit of compression by stuffing them pretty tightly. They have high quality zippers and they're made out of a tough, but still lightweight, nylon material. All in all, it was a good purchase and I would recommend these to others.
customer_reviews.author: DavidB

customer_reviews.title: EBags by far are the BEST travel cubes I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your time looking at other travel cubes. They're not worth it. Believe me, I know. I've tried MANY and always come back to the EBags brand. They come in a variety of colors and sizes, the fabric is sturdy and the zippers are not cheap. I probably own about 20 sets in various sizes (and yes, between travel, RV's, packing my daughter's college clothing between seasons and semesters, I use them ALL) I have some sets that are probably 10-12 years old and they still look brand new. I can't say enough about them. I've never been disappointed or had something go wrong with them. Excellent product, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Yoli from NJ

customer_reviews.title: Organized travel!
customer_reviews.text: I packed for a 2 week European vacation using these, fit everything in a carry on! I’ll never travel without them again. My husband has 15 t shirts 15 boxer briefs (take up a lot of room) 3 button down dress shirts, 3 polos, 6 pair shorts 2 jeans all in a carry on using these cubes!
customer_reviews.author: natalie reposh

customer_reviews.title: If you travel- these are essential !
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't live without these packing cubes. I have 2 sets and bought this set as a gift for someone else. I am able to consolidate more items in these cubes than I would otherwise be able to pack loosely and they protect the items from wrinkling and sliding around in the suitcase. In hotel rooms, I never unpack the cubes -just place them in the dresser drawers and everything is organized. When its time to leave, packing is a breeze. -- just throw them back in the suitcase. I like the larger sizes for dresses, jackets and slacks, smaller sizes for underwear, socks, gym gear etc. Special one for shoes and sneakers.. Beats zip lock bags.
customer_reviews.author: Ndr

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe I'm writing a review for nylon zip up pouches...but they are fantastic! They make it much easier to pack stuff and then stuff it into my suitcase. I like that my clothes are well contained and compact. if I need to get something out while in the airport it's easy to just pull the right cube and get whatever I need. No more socks falling out while I dig to the bottom! I also like using them at hotels. I just pull each cube out and place them in a drawer. It's q lot neater and easier than living out of the suitcase or fearing that I forgot something in a drawer when I leave.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: great for organizing
customer_reviews.text: I like these for traveling. I like to have my clothes organized when I travel. I don't usually use the drawers in hotel rooms just because I don't know what was in them before me. I do hang my good things in the closets but I like to have my underwear and other things organized so that I don't have to go through my suitcase each time I want something. These are great for that. I have loved them since I purchased them. Would definitely purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: C. Michelle Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Makes packing and unpacking a breeze and reduces wrinkles
customer_reviews.text: I have used these bags for traveling given to me as a gift by my mother for over 10 years. On any trip reduces wrinkles and cuts packing and unpacking time. Shoe bags keep shoes off the rest of the clothes. Helps with organization if living out of a bag on long trips with frequent moves. So I gave a turquoise set to my daughter in law. She loved it. Color very striking. Will have to get some additional sets for my daughter and older granddaughter.
customer_reviews.author: Carol F.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE using these when traveling!
customer_reviews.text: Packing cubes are soooo beneficial when packing! Especially if you are packing for a week or longer. You can put all your underclothes in one, pajamas and swimming clothes in one, t-shirts and accessories in one, etc., and just transfer them to a dresser drawer when you get to where you're going. Allows you to have easy access to your stuff and keeps things nice and tidy. It speeds up both packing and unpacking, and if you're an over-packer, it allows you to cram more stuff in your suitcase. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Lesa Grumbles

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I give a 4 is because I wish they had multi colors! Couldn’t figure out what I packed cause I had several sizes the same color. Great for packing! Plenty of room alone them. I didn’t even fill them all up! Definitely help to organize! You’ll love them. My mom and grandma got some different colors so we’re all gonna trade to help with the color issue lol. So far pretty durable. Zippers are all good
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Glad I Finally Got Them
customer_reviews.text: I have used these 2 or 3 times so far. I really like them. I usually organize by type of clothes, rather than outfit, but I can see it being helpful for both. For example, one bag is socks and underwear, one is casual tops, and another is “these have to go on hangers as soon as we get there”. They are also excellent for storage at home. If things don’t seem to fit well, think about a different way of folding them, just don’t try to jam too much into one bag - the point is to keep your things looking nice, after all.
customer_reviews.author: AnnaB

customer_reviews.title: It hasn't even been a week.
customer_reviews.text: It's sad to see something supposedly built for durability, not last even one trip, much less one week. Currently 4 days into my trip and first time using these cubes only to find them falling apart already. Or at least the straps to the zipper. As long as the main product itself manages to stay together in one piece I should be fine, but it's hard to feel confident about its quality when the simplest part just separates on its own. Does this company not have any pride to their quality or their reputation?
customer_reviews.author: TLee

customer_reviews.title: I also love the fact that they fit perfectly in my suitcase ...
customer_reviews.text: I have read about this packing cubes for several years. I was always reluctant to buy them thinking it would something I would use once and never use it again. I have now been on 3 trips with the cubes. It makes it so much easier to organize what I am going to take. I also love the fact that they fit perfectly in my suitcase and I can easily find what I am looking for without rifling though everything. Most recently I used them on our camping trip in our Airstream. I had always used baskets to store my clothes. I got rid of all my baskets and now will only use these. They are amazing!!!
customer_reviews.author: PAULA ROBINSON

customer_reviews.title: Makes packing/unpacking much easier
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how these compare to other packing cubes, this is my first set and I love how easy it was to stay organized after arrival, or after TSA unpacks your bag looking for something. the only downside is I wish they were designed to fit together in a standard size suitcase. Once you're this organized you want the pieces to fit together like a puzzle.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Welty

customer_reviews.title: Way more efficient use of space in my luggage thanks to these.
customer_reviews.text: Love the color, the carrying handle, the see-through mesh so you can pull what you want. These converted me into a packing cube woman. WAY more efficient use of space in my luggage as a result. Great zipper quality and fabric as well. Going on another choir tour: dress blacks in the medium cube, all under garments/socks in the long narrow one. You can really dial in how you want to organize!
customer_reviews.author: Nan Haemer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted for suitcase organization!
customer_reviews.text: I looked at tons of packing cube options and eventually settled on these. They are great for keeping your suitcase organized. I plan to buy different colors for my kids. Although I purchased them for use in suitcases and transfer to hotel room drawers, I have been pleased to find that they are handy for organizing backpack contents for excursions or shorter term trips.
customer_reviews.author: Summery

customer_reviews.title: Effective, well-constructed, and convenient
customer_reviews.text: I love these cubes! They helped me to pack A LOT of clothes in my suitcase for a 3-week vacation. What is also great is that you can organize your clothes so that you don't have to unpack/dig through your suitcase to find things - just pull out the cube you need and then pop the cube back into your suitcase. This was especially helpful as we were on a tour, so there were times when we only stayed one night at a hotel. Being able to quickly find only the clothes I needed was super convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Christine McHolley

customer_reviews.title: Pack more and keep it organized
customer_reviews.text: These are the greatest things ever invented! I can pack so much more and so neatly using these bags. I recommend them to everyone I can. I bought them for a 2-week trip to Europe. I was going to 5 different countries which meant packing and unpacking multiple times. These bags made that so easy. The bonus was in the hotels that didn't have drawers available, I could just put the bags on a shelf and everything stayed neat and tidy. No clothes all over the hotel room. No searching for anything. I cannot stress the organization enough. One of the best purchases I've ever made.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Ferris

customer_reviews.title: Easy Organization!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these packing cubes. I was preparing for a long trip where we would be staying at a friend's and then camping in a very small cabin. I wanted to make sure everything stayed organized so I didn't end up with a disaster of clothes, toiletries, camping gear, and dog stuff! These bags were super helpful and I thought very well made. The zippers worked easily, the material is just fine for packing within another bag or tote. I can't believe I've been packing this long without cubes!
customer_reviews.author: Vixxm

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel!
customer_reviews.text: These packing cubes are very well made and wonderful for organizing your suitcase for travel! They keep everything tidy and easily accessible. On the trip home, one of my suitcases was over the 50 pound limit. It was so easy to open and take out one of the cubes to move to my lighter bag. I was at the counter checking in and I was able to quickly open my suitcase and grab a cube out and I didn't have a mess or anything falling out and no one could see my dirty laundry. I will be purchasing another set prior to my next trip.
customer_reviews.author: mom4girls

customer_reviews.title: Super Useful for Organized Packing and Maximizing Space
customer_reviews.text: I'm addicted to these! The large one is great for larger suitcases and will fit multiple outfits in one bag. The medium is great for only tops or maybe 2 days worth of outfits plus some smaller stuff. I also use the longer more narrow bag for bras, socks etc. It helps maximize space and keeps everything in its place! I ordered more large bags and will probably order more medium ones too!
customer_reviews.author: BT

customer_reviews.title: Organized Travel Must
customer_reviews.text: My son bought these as a gift. I was a little skeptical, however they made packing and organizing easier. I didn't have to unpack everything to get to something specific. Brilliant accessory foe traveling! And I use them in my trunk organizer as well! Love multitaskers!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love my packing Cubes!
customer_reviews.text: This particular brand is well made as the zippers function nicely and the material is durable. Good combination of sizes. Perfect for packing several people in to one suit case. You can easily identify and pass out clothes to the right kids. Direct them to put their dirty clothes back in to these & you don't have to chase down clothes later. Makes packing super easy. It would be nice to have multiple colors in a set for packing for multiple people. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: ACEBoys

customer_reviews.title: Best travel bag ever!
customer_reviews.text: I also have the e bag carry on size. I cannot say enough great things about eBag. My husband and I do a lot of international travel and we were able to pack for a 2’week trip with the packing cubes and the carry on. I also use these for other trips. I would 100% recommend.
customer_reviews.author: John Bumgarner

customer_reviews.title: Stop hesitating-- buy these now!
customer_reviews.text: Until you try packing cubes, you don't understand their value. I have tried several brands, and ebags packing cubes are HANDS DOWN the best!! They are more durable, and better constructed than any of the other brands I have tried (most recently Amazon Basics and Sharper Image). If you're having any doubts, I promise you won't regret the decision to purchase these!
customer_reviews.author: AWamazonreviews

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Made the trip to Italy a breeze! Stayed organized the whole time and wrinkle free too. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: cfdurgan

customer_reviews.title: Nice for packing
customer_reviews.text: I was doubtful about the packing cubes for travel and how they would benefit me but was pleasantly surprised. They held more than I thought they would plus my clothes were less wrinkled and suitcase stayed orderly - everything wasn't squashed to one side or the other. I plan on buying a couple more medium and large sized.
customer_reviews.author: P. Giachetti

customer_reviews.title: Life saver when living out of a suitcase.
customer_reviews.text: I have really enjoyed these cubes so far to keep my luggage more organized. I travel often and find myself living out of my suitcase at different locations. While I'm not sure that these particually save me space, I love having my clothes together and not having to dig or move a lot of clothes to get at what I want. For future use, I know these will come in handy for traveling with my husband when we use the same bag. So far the only con for me is that I think I would better like semi rigid edges/corners.
customer_reviews.author: Jinipea

customer_reviews.title: Legit !
customer_reviews.text: Omg I love this ! Went to Costa Rica and stayed in 5 different hotels. These were a lifesaver ! So easy to separate clothes (clean and dirty) and also also used to hold electronics, large toiletries, etc. I was able to pack very neatly SO MUCH STUFF. I couldn't believe how much I could fit in my suitcase and easily manage all of my things. These will be Christmas presents for all of my family members!
customer_reviews.author: jade

customer_reviews.title: The small cubes are very small, and the large ...
customer_reviews.text: The small cubes are very small, and the large cube isn't very large. I would I have bought a different set if I had realized how the sizes translated to reality. Well made product.
customer_reviews.author: Lily Rose

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I got the 6pc set in raspberry and I love them! I have not had the opportunity to use them yet, but I will pretty soon. I used to use those plastic bags that you compress the air out of - had them for years and bought them from HSN. Well, the last time I used those bags, they were not compressing much anymore - I think they have holes in them because they poof back up after a little while. I like these so much I ordered another set (the 3pc set this time). Thanks eBags and Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: MysticalRoseTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Love the e bags
customer_reviews.text: I have these in 4 colors. They are the bomb for packing in a neat and organized manner. We mix and match them rather than use all one color so that we can identify what is in the back (dresses in green, shirts in yellow, ...). You only need about three for a week of vacation so we have extra, but they are super and well made. I highly recommend them for all kinds of packing.
customer_reviews.author: Yarnfinder

customer_reviews.title: Stay sane while packing, and know where everything is!
customer_reviews.text: These cubes are wonderful for packing and staying organized! The only issue I have with them is that the largest sized one is really big. I highly recommend these for anyone who is trying to stay sane while making sure they have everything packed that they need. The fabric was lightweight and durable.
customer_reviews.author: CembalistaTop Contributor: Pianos

customer_reviews.title: This is my second set!
customer_reviews.text: These are a lifesaver when you're traveling and need to maximize space and organization. I received my first set as a gift several years ago - and they're holding up great. But I decided to treat myself to a second set, to maximize options when I have a big trip planned or back to back trips to make packing ahead easier. Well worth the very reasonable price!
customer_reviews.author: Mahphotog

customer_reviews.title: Love eBags Packing Cubes!
customer_reviews.text: Love them!! I always tend to over-pack and had a very small suitcase (22 inches) this time. I used all the bags and was able to fill them easily (using the KonMari folding method from Marie Kondo's two books). As others have said, they act as little "drawers" during the trip and are very neat when opening and closing the suitcase. Only thing I would suggest to the company -make the six-piece set in 6 colors to make it easier to find items. I plan to tie on colorful ribbons - easy to do with the mesh tops.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn W. Frey

customer_reviews.title: The mesh seems pretty sturdy, though I won't know until I use ...
customer_reviews.text: I finally had a chance to try these out on a short trip out of town. The zippers come with large grips so you don't have to fumble and didn't catch on anything. The sizes are varied and the largest one fits perfectly in the base of a carry-on bag. The mesh seems pretty sturdy, though I won't know until I use these for a while if they hold up. Overall, I would recommend this product. As for the dealer, everything arrived quickly and properly packaged. No complaints about service at all.
customer_reviews.author: K.C.

customer_reviews.title: Won't ever travel with out my eBags!
customer_reviews.text: I recently had a chance to try out my new eBags and I love them! I bought them for a trip this summer to Europe but had a conference to attend last month so I thought I would try them out and now I don't think I will ever travel without them. After the conference, I went to visit a relative in another part of the state so I used the eBags to separate out my clothes as so I only had what I needed for the few days I was visiting the relative. Also the smaller eBags are great for keeping similar items together such as medications or undergarments.
customer_reviews.author: evelyn stone

customer_reviews.title: Yes!  They will make traveling better
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical on whether cubes would actually make packing and traveling easier. But they are wonderful. I love how they keep everything organized in the suitcase, I can pack a few like items, zip the cube, and cross it off my list. And then when I get to my destination, I just put the cubes in the drawers in the hotel, and everything still stays so organized. I love these. Have recently bought a few more.
customer_reviews.author: Penelope

customer_reviews.title: very practical when traveling
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy that I purchased these e-bags. They came in so handy when traveling. Everything was so organized and confined that I didn't have to worry about clothes being tossed around in my suitcase when traveling as they had in the past. So glad I bought them. I even purchased more upon returning from my trip.
customer_reviews.author: Snoopy

customer_reviews.title: Why Didn't I Get These Sooner??
customer_reviews.text: I am SO excited to try these out on my cruise next week! I can not believe how lightweight they are, soft and flexible, plus see through. My suitcase has never looked so neat! I can find everything at a glance and it will be perfect while on board in the cabins as there are no dressers, just cubbies, and these eBags will just slide on a shelf and keep everything together like a dresser drawer. I also bought the grey 4 pack thinking if I had too many my husband could use the spares. Well guess what? I have found a use for them all!
customer_reviews.author: five2nine

customer_reviews.title: Liked so much bought 4 more
customer_reviews.text: Just what we were looking for. Makes packing for multiple day/multiple stops a breeze. Easier to live out of the suitcase while on the road. Enables me to pack much more, yet keep it reasonably wrinkle free. Come in sets (one of each size) and multiple of a single size. I found it best to have a few of the mediums, a few of the smalls and a few of the long-smalls. The large was utilized the least. Use multiple colors to code for days of the week or if family members traveling we group our clothes (no one puts all their clothing in one suit case - if that suitcase was lost, that person would have no clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Slappy

customer_reviews.title: Organized Packing
customer_reviews.text: These packing cubes are great for travel. They provide organization and easier packing -- easy to find what you're looking for and keeps clothing in better shape. I would not want to go back to packing without them. I've also given them as gifts to family who travel regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Carlaw

customer_reviews.title: Travel Game Changer
customer_reviews.text: These packing cubes make traveling very easy and organized. The larger pouch will easily hold 6 outfits (3-4 pairs of jeans, sweaters and tops), the long and thin pouches hold at least a weeks worth of undergarments. I use the medium pouches for my blow drier and brushes. The cubes make traveling a breeze since you can identify where everything is fast. I bought a second set to organize pajamas, day clothes, evening outfits and undergarments. I've washed my set a few times with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Stina

customer_reviews.title: Great way to pack
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with these packing cubes. I used them on a 2 week trip to Italy, and my clothes stayed organized and neat. This was my first experience with packing cubes, and traveling with my clothes organized this way. I'm sold on this method! This set has a good variety of sizes and I used them all. I bought an additional set of three medium size, which were helpful to supplement packing additional tops. They are a good quality material and the zippers seen very sturdy. I'm very happy I bought them and will use them for all my travels!
customer_reviews.author: schoolbizmom

customer_reviews.title: Sadly 2nd set to arrived covered in odd TOXIC,  white powdery dust, burned hands & eyes. Really weird..BUT, GREAT PRODUCT !
customer_reviews.text: Sadly 2nd set to arrived covered in odd TOXIC, white powdery dust, burned hands & eyes. Really weird.. Had to wash thoroughly before using. BUT.. That said.. Great product !! Perfect travel organizers ! Super lightweight, manageable sizing, happy colors, see through fabric, keeps things from getting lost in deep suitcases !! Great for scarves, socks, undergarments, t-shirts, electronics, CDs/ DVDs, books, papers, shoes.. They really cut down time trying to locate items in suitcases, duffel bags, closets, drawers.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Girl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cubes, the combination of cubes in the set can be improved
customer_reviews.text: I love these packing cubes -- I don't know how I survived traveling as much as I did without them! My husband's shirts fit just fine in the medium cubes. Briefs in the long rectangular ones. Everything is perfect except that I think it would be better to have more medium cubes than the long narrow ones, because one typically packs more shirts than anything else. Also, I find that I am not able to use the biggest cube as much as the others.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Must have for travel/camping!
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t actually tried these out yet but my sister had them on a recent visit and I thought the were great! Easy to sort and find stuff in a suitcase and would be great for the camper!
customer_reviews.author: jks

customer_reviews.title: Organization Plus
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved these so much she won't share! I ordered these cubes and told my daughter that she would be the guinea pig for the family to see if I needed to order sets for all of us. She went to New York on a spring break trip and the first thing she said while unpacking was, "You need to order these for everyone because these are mine." The material is sturdy enough and the cubes hold all clothing items perfectly. She was sharing her room with other girls amd was able to stay completely organized the entire trip. We ate heading on vacation this summer and these are on the list. Heading to reorder!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best variety set!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful set, all the best sizes. My daughter has a tendency to overpack but these bags provide a visual reminder not to overstuff, and cause pause to ask, 'Am I really going to need that?' I love the idea of a different color for everyone to easily find your own belongings from the suitcase. Helps us stay organized and keep things together while traveling. Lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Crusanne

customer_reviews.title: Quality material and very practical
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags because they are thin, yet durable, and don't take up a lot of space in my bag. Other packing cubes are stiffer and waste valuable space in a bag if not filled completely. These cubes can be squished into any empty space in a suitcase of travel bag. The variety of cube sizes that come in this set is useful, and I like being able to see what is in each cube through the mesh. Also, other cubes only open on one end. Having the zipper go all the way around the top makes any item inside easily accessible.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great organizers!
customer_reviews.text: I love these packing cubes! They made packing up my RV SO much easier. No more loading clothes into bags, lugging the bags out to the RV, unloading the bags and putting stuff into drawers, all the while trying to keep things sorted. I just put things in neat order in the packing cubes, carried them out to the RV -- all six of these plus six shoe ebags at once -- and placed them in the drawers and closet. Everything is neat and organized. Wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: DeweyLib

customer_reviews.title: Great help when traveling
customer_reviews.text: I like them more than I thought I would. They really help me remain organized when traveling; less digging thru luggage to find things; instead, just keep the bags in the drawer (or luggage) and things are easy to locate. When repacking, anything left clean remains that way. High quality and the YKK zippers are a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Sparksongs

customer_reviews.title: My favorite packing helpers
customer_reviews.text: As I travel more my suitcases get smaller. These bags help me organize my clothes as outfits so I can easily find what I want. The sizes are just right and the colors are pretty. The zippers are sturdy and the handles are useful.
customer_reviews.author: SaraM

customer_reviews.title: I was able to nicely pack my husband and I into a single Osprey ...
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about how helpful these would be but they were well worth it. I was able to nicely pack my husband and I into a single Osprey 65 liter backpack for a 2 week trip in the UK. This included all our clothes and toiletries. It allowed us to stay very organized and quickly pack/unpack while changing hotels every 1-2 nights. When you're not traveling, they can be used to nicely pack away seasonal clothing. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Must Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time using travel cubes and OH MY GOD!! I love these travel cubes!! Best travel investment. I can't believe how much stuff I was able to fit in my suit case, but be warned..... you might pack too much!! A definite must buy if you travel!
customer_reviews.author: El

customer_reviews.title: ... bags because of a friend's recommendation and they are amazing! I use the Large 17
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these bags because of a friend's recommendation and they are amazing! I use the Large 17.5 x 12.75 x 3.25, and Medium 13.75 x 9.75 x 3, most often. They're perfect for a day trip in a backpack. Or a long trip in a large suitcase. If you're looking for a way to keep your clothing organized and worried about clothes spilling out of you bag if it ever falls open (it's happened to me!) these are a great option. As to their durability, we've used these over 20 times in the past year and I've overfilled them on multiple occasions and the zippers have never failed on me. The quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Drury

customer_reviews.title: I love my packing cubes
customer_reviews.text: I love my packing cubes! I had been wanting to get some for a while. I like to pack with pouches and this just makes my life so much easier. I found that the large was too big for my needs; it fits in a large checked suitcase (which I rarely use) or my quilted duffle.
customer_reviews.author: CarmenMishael

customer_reviews.title: Good quality cubes and many choices!
customer_reviews.text: These packing cubes really do condense the clothes giving more space in the suitcase. It a helps me organize my clothes. I love that my clothes won't get tumbled around and wrinkled. I also love the assortment of colors and sizes to choose from and bought the green and turquoise.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy & Eric Levine

customer_reviews.title: Should have started using these travel bags years ago!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best for travel! They organize the suitcase and can go right into a drawer at the hotel! Only reason I didn't give 5 stars for wrinkle free is because that would be dependent on how well/carefully the clothes are rolled to go into the bag- my clothes were all essentially wrinkle free. I strongly recommend these bags!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Kost

customer_reviews.title: Must Have For Travel
customer_reviews.text: How I traveled without packing cubes all these years, I don't know. They are a great invention and perfect for me because I can't keep my suitcase contents tidy without them. The mesh allows me to see what is inside, the zippers work well, overall the quality is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: SR Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Great for organizing and moving between hotels etc
customer_reviews.text: A friend recommended these and I love them. It’s so nice to have everything organized so that if you are moving around you don’t have to shuffle through your bag to find things.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa & Adam

customer_reviews.title: Better than other brands
customer_reviews.text: I've tried several brands...These hold up the best! If you've never traveled using cubes, they will change your whole experience :-) Just beware, you can pack so much more in a small space & go over your weight limit! I bought these as a gift for friends
customer_reviews.author: Moon Shimmer

customer_reviews.title: I purchased these about 6 years ago and absolutely love them. I have given them as gifts and ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these about 6 years ago and absolutely love them. I have given them as gifts and the recipients love them as well. Great way to keep all your belongings packed together and keeps them from getting shuffled around in your suitcase. You won't regret getting these!
customer_reviews.author: T. Clay

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: These are incredible for traveling. Light weight and each has a handle for easily moving them from your suitcase to a drawer. Keeps everything neat and organized.
customer_reviews.author: Lillie

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE using these bags to pack and stay organized on ...
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE using these bags to pack and stay organized on my trip. I didn't think they would make much difference for packing, but I LOVE the organization they added to my luggage. I had more room in my suitcase vs. rolling clothing. Easy to find items I needed when dressing each day. My son didn't ask me once where something of his was, he was able to find everything he needed AND he stayed organized for the first time EVER!!! That right there makes it worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: W-OKC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Packing Smart
customer_reviews.text: If you have never used that you can't see the benefit until you try it out. Will never pack again without it. Allows you to have your luggage all the time ready to go! It is like having drawers inside your luggage! This was my first set, I have already bought additional units so I can accommodate all my clothes accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Volpe

customer_reviews.title: Great for packing and organizing!
customer_reviews.text: This is our fourth set of eBags packing cubes. They are great for packing and organizing suitcases. Each family member has a color making it easy to tell what belongs each person in a suitcase.
customer_reviews.author: Emily E. H. Barton

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love my e-bag packing cubes
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love my e-bag packing cubes. I enjoy the separate bags for my clothes !! No more suitcase disaster when looking for an outfit. The shirts are in their own cube as well as the shorts,shoes and undergarments. I even packed earlier than my trip date because I could keep organized. Don’t try and take my packing cubes cause I love them 😍
customer_reviews.author: Linda Ingram

customer_reviews.title: Essential packing accessory
customer_reviews.text: I never realized how much using packing cubes was an essential part of traveling. Although the bags seemed small at first, I was amazed that I managed to get 6 rolled up t-shirts into one of the small, slim bags! I am much more confident now that my summer trip will be less stressful and more organized. Also, the materials used to make the bags are very lightweight, and seem durable. I just love these bags!
customer_reviews.author: lovelife

customer_reviews.title: GREAT packing cubes
customer_reviews.text: These are great! lightweight, sturdy fabric and zippers. Great way to organize clothes for camping, travel or in dresser drawers.
customer_reviews.author: Ivynana

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love these cubes!
customer_reviews.text: I did not believe my clothing would fit in these bags, but they did, beautifully. Neatest packed suitcase I have ever traveled with. Upon arrival I took all the cubes out and unzipped them and placed directly in drawers in hotel. Upon leaving, zipped them up and I was ready to go!! Wish I would have had these a long time ago. I difinitely recommend the cubes.
customer_reviews.author: DawnD1

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase ever for traveling.
customer_reviews.text: I got two sets of these; one in green and one in red. I packed all my items in the green set and my husbands items in the red set. it made it very easy to identify whose clothing was who's when we were looking for items to wear. They packed up neatly in the one suitcase. I use to bring 2 suitcases one for my stuff and one for my husbands stuff. Now I can put it all in one and still know immediately whose white socks are whose . Best purchase ever for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: A good purchase. Keeps things contained and where you can find them,.later
customer_reviews.text: These have been so useful for keeping packed items contained and where you can find them easily, later. Glad I got these.
customer_reviews.author: Endless Summer

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome!! Don't know how I managed without them
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome!! Don't know how I managed without them! They keep everything organized and easy to locate.. I put makeup in small one, toiletries in medium one, two pairs of shoes in the rectangular ones and clothes in the big one. Then they all fit in nicely into a small carry-on suitcase!! Totally worth the purchase price. Durable too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These bags are awesome! They kept me organized with my one small ...
customer_reviews.text: These bags are awesome! They kept me organized with my one small suitcase on a recent overseas trip. They are easy to open (zippers work well) and I don't know why I didn't know about them before now. Am considering organizing my dresser drawers with them! I will never travel without them again.
customer_reviews.author: BR

customer_reviews.title: It helps you keep specific clothing items together for easy finding in your suitcase
customer_reviews.text: They work so well at separating your packing. Underwear in one, dress up clothes in another, lounging clothes in another, and however makes it easier to find what you need in your suitcase without ripping everything out to find what you need. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Penny A. Kempfert

customer_reviews.title: A better solution than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think I needed packing cubes but these made my organization so much better. I thought they would take up precious space but that wasn't the case. These cubes are easy to use, seem well constructed and I like the mesh to see the contents.
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: BRILLIANT FOR TRAVELIG
customer_reviews.text: brilliant, i am a world traveler and ordered these with the intentions of probably sending them back, when i travel i pack and repack so many times and live out of my suitcase because i dont want my clothes etc in the drawers. i am packed and ready to go next week and i love love love them, did i say i love them lol. my pants, shirts, bathing suits hygienic items and electronics are all in separate bags with little handles on them. I have no idea how i lived without them
customer_reviews.author: suebee

customer_reviews.title: Best. Ever.
customer_reviews.text: If you're on the fence about purchasing these, wondering if you REALLY need packing cubes, I'm here to tell you that YOU NEED THESE CUBES!!! I used mine for the first time on a trip over the holiday and I couldn't believe how organized my suitcase was! And how much I could fit in there! Even my husband noticed how neat everything was, and let's face it, he's a guy, and doesn't really care about the tidiness of the suitcase. Plus, our large suitcase ended up being 4 lbs overweight and instead of having to dig around for stuff to pull out, I just moved one of the smaller cubes to my carry on. DONE! Buy these now!
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle D McCollum

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and good selection of sizes to suit most suitcases / carry on bags / rucksacs.
customer_reviews.text: Great for segregating my clothes from my wife's when using a single suitcase in an effort to keep baggage fees down. Simple and effective, just pull out my stuff from the case on arrival.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these eBags!
customer_reviews.text: Love these eBags! The variety of sizes worked well for me and there are larger sizes available which I also purchased for bulky winter sweaters, etc. I can’t recommend them enough!!
customer_reviews.author: Degal

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: I love these travel cubes. They make packing easier. They also are great to stay organized when i'm out of town.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get organzed and stay that way during travels
customer_reviews.text: I mistakenly ordered both the red and black and when they both arrived , asked for a return on the red. However, my husband likes these ebags and we wound up using both red and black ones. It is so easy to just lift the bag and contents out of luggage and into a drawer at the hotel. Everything is organized and stays that way. So I am canceling the return.
customer_reviews.author: P. McAfee

customer_reviews.title: Great to travel and be organized
customer_reviews.text: Never used packing cubes before... These worked great. Traveled to Ireland with different accommodations during trip... Easy to stay organized, find what I needed in my suitcase and remain wrinkle free.
customer_reviews.author: Knoxcustomer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Love these eBags! My husband and I to travel unexpectedly and just had time to pack 2 small carry on bags. We used the eBags and were pleasantly surprised by how many clothes we were able to get into them. I will definitely be using them whenever we travel.
customer_reviews.author: Jane G

customer_reviews.title: Great Organizers for traveling.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these along with our ebags backpacks and they were very helpful in keeping things organized. Our trip across the country by rail was living in tight quarters on Amtrak. These didn't take too much time to find what you are looking for. They did fit very well inside the backpacks and you could arrange them in any order that made sense to you.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas W. Klose

customer_reviews.title: Good Bags!
customer_reviews.text: Bags are made well and very helpful in packing for a long trip. The three (3) small bags were so small they were not very useful for my needs. The larger bags were great for organizing my underwire, socks and tee shirts as well as pull over casual shirts.
customer_reviews.author: E. Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: These serve their purpose but are too flexible. They need more structure to make them easier to pack.
customer_reviews.author: E. Forbes

customer_reviews.title: Pack more in less space!!!
customer_reviews.text: The best!! Watched how to roll my clothes on you tube and had no wrinkles and fit so much in these bags!! Love them!! Didn't have to unpack everything just placed the bags in the drawers. Easy to pack and unpack when you arrive!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: Used them for our 30 day travel to Europe .Great for packing and unpacking .
customer_reviews.author: vy

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: All good, used these myself and bought for relatives to give them a huge travel advantage. Great idea, quality made. Zibbers have stood the test of stress and time.
customer_reviews.author: Colin J. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Where have you been all my life?
customer_reviews.text: I really like these packing cubes. Why didn't I get these sooner? Great for fitting in a lot of stuff when you have limited space in your luggage and helps keep you organized on the trip. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda L.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I love these! They actually make packing fun! You will be surprised how much can fit in each one, and there is a very nice variety! I hope it is as it says, with lifetime warranty... great product, very versatile. I Love the handles on the sides too.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Peterdi

customer_reviews.title: Packing cubes the way to go
customer_reviews.text: Used packing cubes for the first time. Went on land sea to Alaska, so hotel before, cruise, resort 1, resort 2 and last night hotel. Never unpacked cubes. Just took cube, placed in drawer and worked from the cube. Then, zipped and put back in bag. The easiest trip packing wise we ever had. Product is strong, zippers good. I recommend to anyone who travels.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling
customer_reviews.text: These really work out great for as much as I travel. I like being able to compartmentalize my clothes / toiletries inside my luggage.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine H

customer_reviews.title: Very organized!
customer_reviews.text: I used these with my eBags weekender backback. I wanted to use my weekender for an all week trip to Orlando to avoid the baggage fees (I used it as a carryon). The packing cubes worked wonderfully inside the backpack. A spot for everything...and everything in it's place.
customer_reviews.author: ADKHockeywife

customer_reviews.title: Great bags though and helped me keep everything organized when ...
customer_reviews.text: You do not need this many bags for a trip to Europe. I went for 2 months overseas and 3 bags worked out perfectly - I guess i'll have 3 more now to collect dust. I don't think you'd need all 6 unless you have a large family. Great bags though and helped me keep everything organized when moving out and moving in constantly!
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: An organizer's dream
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I would benefit from these until I bought them on a whim on PrimeDay. I was so wrong! Using them the first time made me realize what I was missing out on. Would recommend to anyone who hates having a messy travel bag/suitcase.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Helps even organized people
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure. I'm pretty organized and travel all the time. Where these helped me, while traveling for work, and wanting to bring work out clothes. Being able to sort my work socks from workout socks was surprisingly nice. Bonus using them as cushioning/padding around wine bottles on a recent trip, the long narrow ones where perfect for that.
customer_reviews.author: C. Johnson

product_meta.title: eBags Classic 6pc Packing Cubes (Black)
product_meta.description: Color:BlackFeaturing six separate zip-around packing cubes, this travel set is a must-have for the traveler who demands organization at all times. The eBags Packing Cubes - 6pc Value Set includes one large, one medium, one small, and three slim cubes, all of which are made from Techlite poly fabric with a breathable mesh top panel for visibility and ventilation. These packing cubes offer an easy way to separate items inside your travel bag as well as maximize space, so you can get the most out of any duffel, checked luggage, or carry-on case. Every cube is well-constructed with fully finished interior seams, soft mesh tops that prevent delicate items from getting damaged, and corded zipper pulls for repeated opening and closing.
feature_bullets: INCLUDES 6 VARIOUS PACKING CUBES: 1 Large (17.5" x 12.75" x 3.25"), 1 Medium (13.75" x 9.75" x 3"), 1 Small (11" x 6.75" x 3") and 3 Slim (2.8" x 14" x 5")

SUPERIOR QUALITY: Highest construction standards utilized, making it a customer-favorite, packing cube of choice. Includes premium self-healing zippers with corded pulls for a lifetime of opening and closing.
DURABLE & CONVENIENT: Interior seams fully finished for durability and soft mesh tops won't damage delicate fabrics or dress clothes. Mesh allows for easy identification - no more digging around!
STAY ORGANIZED: eBags travel packing cubes make the best possible use of valuable packing space and keep everything contained. No more wrinkled clothes and gain more room in your luggage.
LIMITED LIFETIME WARRANTY*: Protects against defects in materials and workmanship. eBags products are made with high quality materials and forward-thinking design.
